page.title: 17MY FAMILY
page.content: There are{5}members in my family.They are my mum and dad and my brothers{ {Simon}and{Matthew.Simon}is the oldest. My parents are self-employed making{ incubators for poultry eggs.The incubator has 4 acetate windows.The shell of the incubator is made from polystyrene.Inside our house there are 8 rooms 4 upstairs and 4 downstairs. There are 16 windows, 4 are sash and the rest are casement.At the side of our house is a carpark in which we let holidaymakers park.We have 2 gardens an orchard and a smaller garden.Our pets include 4 chickens, 7 ducks,2 doves and a cat called{Fluffy.}For safety we've got a smoke alarm and a fire extinguisher.We needed to take our fire extinguisher for safety a the{Bath & West Show.}
